Summary: Assurant (AIZ) faces high risk from 1 bill, with 1 direct and 1 indirect impact, including a €15M fine, indicating significant financial exposure.
SummaryKeypoints: REGULATION (EU) 2024/1689 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL establishes €15,000,000 fine. affecting operations in European Union. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "The Commission may impose on providers of general-purpose AI models fines not exceeding 3 % of their annual total worldwide turnover in the preceding financial year or EUR 15 000 000, whichever is higher."

REGULATION (EU) 2024/1689 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL affects supplier Arcadium Technologies LLC through fine The legislation specifies: "The Commission may impose on providers of general-purpose AI models fines not exceeding 3 % of their annual total worldwide turnover in the preceding financial year or EUR 15 000 000, whichever is higher."
